com.artemis.annotations

Annotation Type Sticky

  • Deprecated.

    @Retention(value=SOURCE)
@Target(value=METHOD)
@Documented
@Deprecated
public @interface Sticky
    Stickied methods have their parameter values persisted for the duration of the EntityFactory instance.

    After a factory has created the first entity, stickied methods throw an IllegalArgumentException. Calling EntityFactory.copy() allows updating stickied values again - until the new factory creates an entity.

    See Also:
    EntityFactory, Bind, UseSetter
